scripts.build-browser-min: mkdir browser; browserify src/index.coffee --extension .coffee --standalone Brinks -t coffeeify -t uglifyify -o browser/brinks.min.js
scripts.build-browser: mkdir browser; browserify src/index.coffee --extension .coffee --standalone Brinks -t coffeeify -o browser/brinks.js
scripts.build: npm run build-browser && npm run build-browser-min && npm run build-npm
